message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $14,000. I believe it offers significant value, even at this price point.  What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I'm willing to negotiate, $10,500 is too low for me.  Could you do $13,000? I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations.
I'm still interested in the product, but I think $13,000 is still a bit high. I'd be willing to meet you in the middle at $11,500. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
